description: Try our easy to follow Soy Sauce Chicken With Noodles  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Soy Sauce Chicken With Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.75 cup Lee Kum Kee Premium Soy Sauce
2 spring onion, 1 cut into 5cm lengths, 1 thinlysliced, to serve
2 bunches chinese broccoli, trimmed, cut into 6cm lengths
1 long red chilli, deseeded, cut into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken, sauce, ginger, star anise and onion in a medium saucepan. Pour over enough water to just cover chicken. Place pan over medium heat and bring to a simmer. Simmer, uncovered, for 8 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Using tongs, transfer chicken to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes. Thinly slice. Reserve stock mixture.
Meanwhile, prepare noodles according to packet instructions.
Strain stock mixture over a large bowl. Discard solids. Return stock mixture to pan and bring to the boil over high heat. Add broccoli and mushrooms, then cook for 3 minutes or until just tender.
Divide noodles, chicken, mushrooms and broccoli among bowls. Spoon over a little stock mixture. Serve sprinkled with chilli and extra onion.
